 no other memory intensive processes are running

Hi Folks,
     =
       I am using Heritrix 1.12.1 to crawl 500,000 thousand URLs.
The setup=
 has 2 machines with 1 GB RAM, each running a crawler
instance with 10 Toe =
Threads.
 
I am observing an avg crawl speed of 3 - 4 URI's per second per =
box 
which is ok considering the built-in politeness.
 
If I were to crawl =
a particular domain RELAXING poiliteness 
how fast can I crawl ?
 
Ideally =
I would like to see a crawl speed of 50 - 100 URIs per second
per box.
 
In=
 other words I would like to know the bottlenecks and known
workarounds
to =
fast crawling and if none exist then I would like to share ideas on
future =
works for improving crawling speeds.
 
 
-Ankur
